li.p: Pustefix: A web application framework. Includes core, environment, editor, and example projects. Technically, pustefix is a cvs module. Caution: the cvs module called pfixcore.
Environment: Pustefix SDK. What you install to develop your own projects with pustefix. Includes core, editor and sample projects. Caution: the respective download is called "skeleton".
Core: Pustefix runtime. Java code for servlets, workflow, and editor. And basic configuration used by projects.

Project: An web application that uses pustefix core. Projects reside in the projects directory. A single environment hosts an arbitray number of projects. Caution 1: the editor also uses the term product. Caution 2: the following directories in projects are not projects: common, core, servletconf.
Editor Modifies projects in a web browser. The editor is itself a project which is part of the core.
